trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure MFA settings in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: This page will show users where in the Azure portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.
trans-unit.target: This page will show users where in the Azure portal they need to go to manage their Azure MFA settings.

trans-unit.source: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Manage your Azure Multi-Factor Authentication settings in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: If you use multi-factor authentication with Azure you will want to manage your additional security verification settings through the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: To access additional security verification settings in the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: To access additional security verification settings in the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: <html></html>At the top of the Azure portal, click on your username. This will bring up a drop-down box.
trans-unit.target: <html></html>At the top of the Azure portal, click on your username. This will bring up a drop-down box.

trans-unit.source: <html></html>From the drop-down box, select Additional security verification. This will open the additional security verification section.
trans-unit.target: <html></html>From the drop-down box, select Additional security verification. This will open the additional security verification section.

trans-unit.source: <html></html>You should now be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.<html></html>
trans-unit.target: <html></html>You should now be on the proof-up page and you can change your settings.<html></html>
